title: Finding the Range
text: Since we know that the quadratic is positive, the minima must be at the vertex. The function is in vertex form, so we know that the range of the function is greater than or equal to $$\frac{8}{11}$$. This can be written as $$f(x) \geq \frac{8}{11}$$

title: Finding the Domain
text: Quadratic functions always have a domain that consists of all real numbers. This can be written as $$-\infty<x<\infty$$.
speech: Quadratic functions always have a domain that consists of all real numbers. This can be written as  minus infinity is less than x is less than infinity .
